banner.title: TP WorkLife 10/12
banner.mainContentHeadline: The podcast where science meets business
banner.mainContent: From fixing meetings to finding a mentor, get new insights to help you enjoy your time at work and thrive in your career.

videoData.title: The sounds and sights of tap dance
videoData.socialTitle: The sounds and sights of tap dance

nodes.whoTheyAre: An international performer, choreographer, educator and speaker, Andrew Nemr explores tap dance as a vehicle for storytelling and community building.
nodes.whyListen: Along with his mentor Gregory Hines, Andrew Nemr cofounded the Tap Legacy Foundation to preserve and advance the art form. Nemr has played with Grammy-winning musicians and been featured in many recordings and films, and is currently the artistic director of the Vancouver Tap Dance Society.

videoData.description: The audio aspect of tap dancing is just as essential as the visual. Choose your own adventure by listening with your eyes closed and/or watching as TED Fellow Andrew Nemr performs an exploration of rhythm and sound, joined by dancers from the Vancouver Tap Dance Society.
videoData.socialDescription: The audio aspect of tap dancing is just as essential as the visual. Choose your own adventure by listening with your eyes closed and/or watching as TED Fellow Andrew Nemr performs an exploration of rhythm and sound, joined by dancers from the Vancouver Tap Dance Society.
